info.title: Maxim SDK API - datasets
info.description: API documentation for Maxim SDK datasets endpoints

createDefaultColumns.description: Create default columns for the dataset. Columns Input and Expected Output will get created by default

columnDataType.description: Type of the data in the column

schema.description: Unique identifier for the dataset to delete

get.description: Get datasets or a specific dataset

schema.description: Whether to list splits within a dataset
Maximum number of records to return (max: 100)

columnDataType.description: Type of the data in the column

datasetId.description: Unique identifier for the dataset to to fetch the columns of

columnIds.description: Unique identifiers for the columns to delete

schema.description: Unique identifier for the dataset to to fetch the columns of
Maximum number of records to return (max: 100)

datasetId.description: Unique identifier for the dataset to to fetch the columns of

columnId.description: columnId of the column you want to update

type.description: Type of the data in the column

entries.description: Entries to be added to a column in a dataset

deleteAll.description: Delete all entries from the dataset

columnIds.description: Unique identifiers for the columns to delete. All entries from this column will be deleted.

rowNo.description: The row number you want to delete from the dataset

entryId.description: The entryId you want to delete from the dataset. This field is required only when a splitId is passed

columnId.description: The columnId of which the entries will be deleted

entries.description: Unique identifiers for the entries to delete. All entries from this entry will be deleted.

schema.description: Unique identifier for a split in the dataset
Maximum number of records to return (max: 30)

rowNo.description: The row number you want to update

columnId.description: The column in the row you want to update

rows.description: Rows of the dataset split. Pass a value of -1 to create an empty split

schema.description: Unique identifier for the dataset split to delete
Unique identifier for the dataset split to delete

id.description: Unique identifier for the dataset split to update
